head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COLEMAN, MARTIN S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COLEMAN, MARTIN S.

block.p: COLEMAN-Martin S. On May 24, 2000, at age 86. Former President and Chairman of the Board of the Mosler Safe Company. Survived by Janet, his wife of 60 years; his children Ann and Fred Lynn, John and Linda Coleman, Nancy and Matthew Mintzis; his grandsons Jeff Lynn and Julian Mintzis; his nephews James Coleman, Robert and William Perper; his niece Victoria Lasdon Rose and his sisterin-law Dorie Coleman. He was the brother of the late Julian Coleman and Janet Perper. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81 St, Saturday 7-9PM with service Sunday, 1:30PM. Interment private. Contributions in his memory may be made to New York University Medical Center, 550 1st Avenue, New York, New York 10016.
